prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles an armored insect with a fierce demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon with green and white colors that has sharp claws and a menacing stance.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a giant bug, with a tough exoskeleton and a defensive battle style.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that thrives in coastal areas, equipped with powerful pincers.
Design a Pokemon that has a rugged appearance, combining elements of both land and water habitats.
Make a fearsome aquatic Pokemon with a unique shell-like body and striking colors.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies both strength and resilience, with an impressive armor-like shell.
